text: The Lady is a 1925 American silent drama movie directed by Frank Borzage and starring Norma Talmadge, Wallace MacDonald, Brandon Hurst, Paulette Duval, Emily Fitzroy, Johnny Fox, Alfred Goulding, George Hackathorne. It was distributed by First National Pictures. == Other websites == * Category:1925 drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Borzage
title: The Lady (1925 movie)
